timeline.bodyText: Hi @hongliu2020, I would expect the cast to predicate here to be unnecessary. Can you try removing it?
timeline.author: donraab

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as above on the cast.
timeline.author: donraab

timeline.bodyText: I would recommend inlining 0 as it will be more self explanatory.
timeline.author: donraab
